name: A Street Romance
description:
A very short set of musings to showcase some free writing and to practice making sound novels, editing backgrounds, and using TyranoBuilder as a means to bring it to life. Not only that, I wanted to try to make some samples for my writing.

This is just going to be one of many. Please let me know what you think in the comments. Thank you for taking the time to read.

If you like this, and want to see more, consider donating to my Ko-Fi or subscribing to my Patreon. 

Resources:
Music: Eric Matyas
Built by: TyranoBuilder
